content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smithing_table
inventory=[{"type": "pink_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 35, "index": 38}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a smithing_table, I need to first craft acacia_planks, which requires placing a stripped_spruce_wood in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move the stripped_spruce_wood from slot 26 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
